metadata.title: CVE-2020-8566 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Kubernetes clusters using Ceph RBD as a storage provisioner, withlogging level of at least 4, Ceph RBD admin secrets can be written to logs.This occurs in kube-controller-manager's logs during provisioning of CephRBD persistent claims. This affects < v1.19.3, < v1.18.10, < v1.17.13.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
